<!-- COMPLETE REFERENCE OF XML CONFIGURATIONS GENERATED BY networking-baremetal-pica8
     This document lists ALL possible XML configurations that the driver can generate -->

<!-- =================== PORT OPERATIONS =================== -->

<!-- 1. CREATE_PORT - Access Mode -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>eth1/1/1</n>
        <config>
          <n>eth1/1/1</n>
          <type xmlns:ianaift="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:iana-if-type">ianaift:ethernetCsmacd</type>
          <enabled>true</enabled>
        </config>
        <ethernet xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces/ethernet">
          <switched-vlan xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/vlan">
            <config>
              <interface-mode>ACCESS</interface-mode>
              <access-vlan>100</access-vlan>
            </config>
          </switched-vlan>
        </ethernet>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 2. CREATE_PORT - Trunk Mode -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>eth1/1/1</n>
        <config>
          <n>eth1/1/1</n>
          <type xmlns:ianaift="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:iana-if-type">ianaift:ethernetCsmacd</type>
          <enabled>true</enabled>
        </config>
        <ethernet xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces/ethernet">
          <switched-vlan xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/vlan">
            <config>
              <interface-mode>TRUNK</interface-mode>
              <trunk-vlans>100</trunk-vlans>
              <trunk-vlans>200</trunk-vlans>
              <native-vlan>1</native-vlan>
            </config>
          </switched-vlan>
        </ethernet>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 3. CREATE_PORT - Disabled Port -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>eth1/1/1</n>
        <config>
          <n>eth1/1/1</n>
          <type xmlns:ianaift="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:iana-if-type">ianaift:ethernetCsmacd</type>
          <enabled>false</enabled>
        </config>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 4. UPDATE_PORT - Change VLAN -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>eth1/1/1</n>
        <ethernet xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces/ethernet">
          <switched-vlan xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/vlan">
            <config>
              <interface-mode>ACCESS</interface-mode>
              <access-vlan>200</access-vlan>
            </config>
          </switched-vlan>
        </ethernet>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 5. UPDATE_PORT - Change to Trunk -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>eth1/1/1</n>
        <ethernet xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces/ethernet">
          <switched-vlan xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/vlan">
            <config>
              <interface-mode>TRUNK</interface-mode>
              <trunk-vlans>100</trunk-vlans>
              <trunk-vlans>200</trunk-vlans>
              <native-vlan>1</native-vlan>
            </config>
          </switched-vlan>
        </ethernet>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 6. UPDATE_PORT - Change Port Status -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>eth1/1/1</n>
        <config>
          <enabled>false</enabled>
        </config>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 7. DELETE_PORT -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface operation="delete">
        <n>eth1/1/1</n>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- =================== BOND/LACP OPERATIONS =================== -->

<!-- 8. CREATE_BOND_MEMBER - Add Port to Existing Aggregate -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>eth1/1/1</n>
        <config>
          <n>eth1/1/1</n>
          <type xmlns:ianaift="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:iana-if-type">ianaift:ethernetCsmacd</type>
          <enabled>true</enabled>
        </config>
        <ethernet xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces/ethernet">
          <config>
            <aggregate-id>Port-Channel1000</aggregate-id>
          </config>
        </ethernet>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
    <lacp xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/lacp">
      <interfaces>
        <interface>
          <n>eth1/1/1</n>
          <config>
            <n>eth1/1/1</n>
            <interval>FAST</interval>
            <lacp-mode>ACTIVE</lacp-mode>
          </config>
        </interface>
      </interfaces>
    </lacp>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 9. CREATE_BOND_AGGREGATE - Create Aggregate Interface -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>Port-Channel1000</n>
        <config>
          <n>Port-Channel1000</n>
          <type xmlns:ianaift="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:iana-if-type">ianaift:ieee8023adLag</type>
          <enabled>true</enabled>
        </config>
        <aggregation xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces/aggregate">
          <config>
            <lag-type>LACP</lag-type>
            <min-links>1</min-links>
          </config>
          <switched-vlan xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/vlan">
            <config>
              <interface-mode>ACCESS</interface-mode>
              <access-vlan>100</access-vlan>
            </config>
          </switched-vlan>
        </aggregation>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 10. CREATE_BOND (FULL) - Create Aggregate + Add Member + LACP -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <!-- Configure member interface -->
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>eth1/1/1</n>
        <config>
          <n>eth1/1/1</n>
          <type xmlns:ianaift="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:iana-if-type">ianaift:ethernetCsmacd</type>
          <enabled>true</enabled>
        </config>
        <ethernet xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces/ethernet">
          <config>
            <aggregate-id>Port-Channel1000</aggregate-id>
          </config>
        </ethernet>
      </interface>
      
      <!-- Configure aggregator interface -->
      <interface>
        <n>Port-Channel1000</n>
        <config>
          <n>Port-Channel1000</n>
          <type xmlns:ianaift="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:iana-if-type">ianaift:ieee8023adLag</type>
          <enabled>true</enabled>
        </config>
        <aggregation xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces/aggregate">
          <config>
            <lag-type>LACP</lag-type>
            <min-links>1</min-links>
          </config>
          <switched-vlan xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/vlan">
            <config>
              <interface-mode>ACCESS</interface-mode>
              <access-vlan>100</access-vlan>
            </config>
          </switched-vlan>
        </aggregation>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
    
    <!-- Configure LACP -->
    <lacp xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/lacp">
      <interfaces>
        <interface>
          <n>eth1/1/1</n>
          <config>
            <n>eth1/1/1</n>
            <interval>FAST</interval>
            <lacp-mode>ACTIVE</lacp-mode>
          </config>
        </interface>
      </interfaces>
    </lacp>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 11. UPDATE_BOND - Change VLAN on Bond -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>Port-Channel1000</n>
        <aggregation xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces/aggregate">
          <switched-vlan xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/vlan">
            <config>
              <interface-mode>ACCESS</interface-mode>
              <access-vlan>200</access-vlan>
            </config>
          </switched-vlan>
        </aggregation>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 12. UPDATE_BOND - Change to Trunk Mode -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>Port-Channel1000</n>
        <aggregation xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces/aggregate">
          <switched-vlan xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/vlan">
            <config>
              <interface-mode>TRUNK</interface-mode>
              <trunk-vlans>100</trunk-vlans>
              <trunk-vlans>200</trunk-vlans>
              <native-vlan>1</native-vlan>
            </config>
          </switched-vlan>
        </aggregation>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 13. DELETE_BOND_MEMBER - Remove Port from Bond -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>eth1/1/1</n>
        <ethernet xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces/ethernet">
          <config>
            <aggregate-id operation="delete"></aggregate-id>
          </config>
        </ethernet>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
    <lacp xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/lacp">
      <interfaces>
        <interface operation="delete">
          <n>eth1/1/1</n>
        </interface>
      </interfaces>
    </lacp>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 14. DELETE_BOND - Remove Entire Bond -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface operation="delete">
        <n>Port-Channel1000</n>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- =================== EVPN/ESI OPERATIONS =================== -->

<!-- 15. CREATE_EVPN_ESI - Configure ESI for Bond -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <network-instances xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/network-instance">
      <network-instance>
        <n>default</n>
        <protocols>
          <protocol>
            <identifier>BGP</identifier>
            <n>bgp-evpn</n>
            <bgp xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/bgp">
              <evpn xmlns="http://pica8.com/yang/evpn">
                <ethernet-segments>
                  <ethernet-segment>
                    <n>Port-Channel1000</n>
                    <config>
                      <n>Port-Channel1000</n>
                      <esi>00:11:22:33:44:55:66:77:88:99</esi>
                      <interface>Port-Channel1000</interface>
                      <active-mode>all-active</active-mode>
                      <df-preference>32767</df-preference>
                    </config>
                    <ethernet-segment-identifier>
                      <config>
                        <system-mac>00:11:22:33:44:55</system-mac>
                      </config>
                    </ethernet-segment-identifier>
                  </ethernet-segment>
                </ethernet-segments>
              </evpn>
            </bgp>
          </protocol>
        </protocols>
      </network-instance>
    </network-instances>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 16. UPDATE_EVPN_ESI - Update ESI Configuration -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <network-instances xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/network-instance">
      <network-instance>
        <n>default</n>
        <protocols>
          <protocol>
            <identifier>BGP</identifier>
            <n>bgp-evpn</n>
            <bgp xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/bgp">
              <evpn xmlns="http://pica8.com/yang/evpn">
                <ethernet-segments>
                  <ethernet-segment>
                    <n>Port-Channel1000</n>
                    <config>
                      <df-preference>25000</df-preference>
                      <active-mode>single-active</active-mode>
                    </config>
                  </ethernet-segment>
                </ethernet-segments>
              </evpn>
            </bgp>
          </protocol>
        </protocols>
      </network-instance>
    </network-instances>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 17. DELETE_EVPN_ESI - Remove ESI Configuration -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <network-instances xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/network-instance">
      <network-instance>
        <n>default</n>
        <protocols>
          <protocol>
            <identifier>BGP</identifier>
            <n>bgp-evpn</n>
            <bgp xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/bgp">
              <evpn xmlns="http://pica8.com/yang/evpn">
                <ethernet-segments>
                  <ethernet-segment operation="delete">
                    <n>Port-Channel1000</n>
                  </ethernet-segment>
                </ethernet-segments>
              </evpn>
            </bgp>
          </protocol>
        </protocols>
      </network-instance>
    </network-instances>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- =================== VLAN/NETWORK OPERATIONS =================== -->

<!-- 18. CREATE_NETWORK - Create VLAN -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <vlans xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/vlan">
      <vlan>
        <vlan-id>100</vlan-id>
        <config>
          <vlan-id>100</vlan-id>
          <n>tenant-network-100</n>
          <status>ACTIVE</status>
        </config>
      </vlan>
    </vlans>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 19. UPDATE_NETWORK - Change VLAN Name -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <vlans xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/vlan">
      <vlan>
        <vlan-id>100</vlan-id>
        <config>
          <n>tenant-network-100-updated</n>
        </config>
      </vlan>
    </vlans>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 20. UPDATE_NETWORK - Change VLAN Status -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <vlans xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/vlan">
      <vlan>
        <vlan-id>100</vlan-id>
        <config>
          <status>SUSPENDED</status>
        </config>
      </vlan>
    </vlans>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 21. DELETE_NETWORK - Delete VLAN -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <vlans xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/vlan">
      <vlan operation="delete">
        <vlan-id>100</vlan-id>
      </vlan>
    </vlans>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- =================== VLAN INTERFACE OPERATIONS =================== -->

<!-- 22. CREATE_VLAN_INTERFACE - Create L3 Interface for VLAN -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>vlan100</n>
        <config>
          <n>vlan100</n>
          <type xmlns:ianaift="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:iana-if-type">ianaift:l3ipvlan</type>
          <enabled>true</enabled>
        </config>
        <subinterfaces>
          <subinterface>
            <index>0</index>
            <ipv4 xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces/ip">
              <addresses>
                <address>
                  <ip>192.168.100.1</ip>
                  <config>
                    <ip>192.168.100.1</ip>
                    <prefix-length>24</prefix-length>
                  </config>
                </address>
              </addresses>
            </ipv4>
          </subinterface>
        </subinterfaces>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
    <vlans xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/vlan">
      <vlan>
        <vlan-id>100</vlan-id>
        <router-interface>
          <config>
            <interface>vlan100</interface>
          </config>
        </router-interface>
      </vlan>
    </vlans>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 23. UPDATE_VLAN_INTERFACE - Change IP Address -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>vlan100</n>
        <subinterfaces>
          <subinterface>
            <index>0</index>
            <ipv4 xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces/ip">
              <addresses>
                <address>
                  <ip>192.168.100.1</ip>
                  <config operation="delete">
                    <ip>192.168.100.1</ip>
                    <prefix-length>24</prefix-length>
                  </config>
                </address>
                <address>
                  <ip>192.168.100.2</ip>
                  <config>
                    <ip>192.168.100.2</ip>
                    <prefix-length>24</prefix-length>
                  </config>
                </address>
              </addresses>
            </ipv4>
          </subinterface>
        </subinterfaces>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 24. DELETE_VLAN_INTERFACE - Remove VLAN Interface -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface operation="delete">
        <n>vlan100</n>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
    <vlans xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/vlan">
      <vlan>
        <vlan-id>100</vlan-id>
        <router-interface operation="delete">
          <config>
            <interface>vlan100</interface>
          </config>
        </router-interface>
      </vlan>
    </vlans>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- =================== VXLAN OPERATIONS =================== -->

<!-- 25. CREATE_VXLAN - Create VXLAN Tunnel -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>vxlan1</n>
        <config>
          <n>vxlan1</n>
          <type xmlns:ianaift="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:iana-if-type">ianaift:tunnel</type>
          <enabled>true</enabled>
        </config>
        <tunnel xmlns="http://pica8.com/yang/tunnel">
          <config>
            <mode>VXLAN</mode>
            <local-ip>10.1.1.1</local-ip>
            <vxlan>
              <vni-mappings>
                <vni-mapping>
                  <vni>10100</vni>
                  <vlan-id>100</vlan-id>
                </vni-mapping>
              </vni-mappings>
            </vxlan>
          </config>
        </tunnel>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 26. UPDATE_VXLAN - Add VNI Mapping -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>vxlan1</n>
        <tunnel xmlns="http://pica8.com/yang/tunnel">
          <config>
            <vxlan>
              <vni-mappings>
                <vni-mapping>
                  <vni>10200</vni>
                  <vlan-id>200</vlan-id>
                </vni-mapping>
              </vni-mappings>
            </vxlan>
          </config>
        </tunnel>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 27. DELETE_VXLAN_MAPPING - Remove VNI Mapping -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>vxlan1</n>
        <tunnel xmlns="http://pica8.com/yang/tunnel">
          <config>
            <vxlan>
              <vni-mappings>
                <vni-mapping operation="delete">
                  <vni>10100</vni>
                </vni-mapping>
              </vni-mappings>
            </vxlan>
          </config>
        </tunnel>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 28. DELETE_VXLAN - Remove VXLAN Tunnel -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface operation="delete">
        <n>vxlan1</n>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- =================== QoS OPERATIONS =================== -->

<!-- 29. CREATE_QOS_POLICY - Create QoS Policy -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <qos xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/qos">
      <scheduler-policies>
        <scheduler-policy>
          <n>tenant-policy</n>
          <config>
            <n>tenant-policy</n>
          </config>
          <schedulers>
            <scheduler>
              <sequence>0</sequence>
              <config>
                <sequence>0</sequence>
                <priority>HIGH</priority>
                <weight>10</weight>
              </config>
            </scheduler>
            <scheduler>
              <sequence>1</sequence>
              <config>
                <sequence>1</sequence>
                <priority>MEDIUM</priority>
                <weight>20</weight>
              </config>
            </scheduler>
            <scheduler>
              <sequence>2</sequence>
              <config>
                <sequence>2</sequence>
                <priority>LOW</priority>
                <weight>70</weight>
              </config>
            </scheduler>
          </schedulers>
        </scheduler-policy>
      </scheduler-policies>
    </qos>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 30. APPLY_QOS_TO_INTERFACE - Apply QoS to Interface -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <qos xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/qos">
      <interfaces>
        <interface>
          <interface-id>eth1/1/1</interface-id>
          <o>
            <scheduler-policy>
              <config>
                <policy>tenant-policy</policy>
              </config>
            </scheduler-policy>
          </o>
        </interface>
      </interfaces>
    </qos>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- 31. CREATE_QOS_CLASSIFIER - Create Classifier for VLAN -->
<edit-config>
  <target>
    <running/>
  </target>
  <config>
    <qos xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/qos">
      <classifiers>
        <classifier>
          <n>tenant-classifier-100</n>
          <config>
            <n>tenant-classifier-100</n>
            <type>VLAN</type>
          </config>
          <terms>
            <term>
              <id>1</id>
              <config>
                <id>1</id>
              </config>
              <conditions>
                <vlan>
                  <config>
                    <vlan-id>100</vlan-id>
                  </config>
                </vlan>
              </conditions>
              <actions>
                <config>
                  <forwarding-group>tenant-traffic-100</forwarding-group>
                </config>
              </actions>
            </term>
          </terms>
        </classifier>
      </classifiers>
      <forwarding-groups>
        <forwarding-group>
          <n>tenant-traffic-100</n>
          <config>
            <n>tenant-traffic-100</n>
            <output-queue>3</output-queue>
          </config>
        </forwarding-group>
      </forwarding-groups>
    </qos>
  </config>
</edit-config>

<!-- =================== GET OPERATIONS =================== -->

<!-- 32. GET_INTERFACE - Get Interface Configuration -->
<get>
  <filter type="subtree">
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces">
      <interface>
        <n>eth1/1/1</n>
      </interface>
    </interfaces>
  </filter>
</get>

<!-- 33. GET_ALL_INTERFACES - Get All Interfaces -->
<get>
  <filter type="subtree">
    <interfaces xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/interfaces"/>
  </filter>
</get>

<!-- 34. GET_VLANS - Get All VLANs -->
<get>
  <filter type="subtree">
    <vlans xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/vlan"/>
  </filter>
</get>

<!-- 35. GET_LACP - Get LACP Configuration -->
<get>
  <filter type="subtree">
    <lacp xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/lacp"/>
  </filter>
</get>

<!-- 36. GET_EVPN - Get EVPN Configuration -->
<get>
  <filter type="subtree">
    <network-instances xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/network-instance">
      <network-instance>
        <n>default</n>
        <protocols>
          <protocol>
            <identifier>BGP</identifier>
            <n>bgp-evpn</n>
            <bgp xmlns="http://openconfig.net/yang/bgp">
              <evpn xmlns="http://pica8.com/yang/evpn">
                <ethernet-segments/>
              </evpn>
            </bgp>
          </protocol>
        </protocols>
      </network-instance>
